mapper.sql: self.RECONCILIATION_ID, self.RECONCILIATION_NUMBER, self.CUSTOMER_ID, self.RECONCILIATION_START_DATE, self.RECONCILIATION_END_DATE, self.CAR_VIN_COUNT, self.TOTAL_AMOUNT, self.RED_AMOUNT, self.BLUE_AMOUNT, self.DEDUCTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT, self.DEDUCTION_REASON, self.CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_DATE, self.SETTLEMENT_DATE, self.CONFIRMOR, self.CONFIRM_DATE, self.CREATOR, self.CREATE_DATE, self.CHECKER, self.CHECK_DATE, self.BILL_STATUS, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, corpA.CORP_NAME as refCustomerName, corpB.CORP_NAME as refCorpName, userA.USER_NAME as refConfirmorName, userB.USER_NAME as refCreatorName, userC.USER_NAME as refCheckerName

where self.DEL = 0 and self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId} and (self.RECONCILIATION_NUMBER = #{reconciliationNumber} or self.RECONCILIATION_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reconciliationNumber}, '%')) and self.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId} and self.RECONCILIATION_START_DATE = #{reconciliationStartDate} and self.RECONCILIATION_END_DATE = #{reconciliationEndDate} and self.CAR_VIN_COUNT = #{carVinCount} and self.TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount} and self.RED_AMOUNT = #{redAmount} and self.BLUE_AMOUNT = #{blueAmount} and self.DEDUCTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{deductionTotalAmount} and self.DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason} and self.CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_DATE = #{customerFeedbackDate} and self.SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate} and self.CONFIRMOR = #{confirmor} and self.CONFIRM_DATE = #{confirmDate} and self.CREATOR = #{creator} and self.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and self.CHECKER = #{checker} and self.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and self.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and self.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and self.FLAG = #{flag} and self.RECONCILIATION_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') and self.CREATE_DATE >= #{startDate} and self.CREATE_DATE <= #{endDate}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation self left join sys_corp corpA on self.CUSTOMER_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_user userA on self.CONFIRMOR = userA.USER_ID left join bd_user userB on self.CREATOR = userB.USER_ID left join bd_user userC on self.CHECKER = userC.USER_ID where self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.insert: insert into fs_customer_reconciliation (RECONCILIATION_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_ID, RECONCILIATION_START_DATE, RECONCILIATION_END_DATE, CAR_VIN_COUNT, TOTAL_AMOUNT, RED_AMOUNT, BLUE_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_REASON, CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_DATE, SETTLEMENT_DATE, CONFIRMOR, CONFIRM_DATE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{reconciliationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reconciliationStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reconciliationEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carVinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{blueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerFeedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settlementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into fs_customer_reconciliation RECONCILIATION_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_ID, RECONCILIATION_START_DATE, RECONCILIATION_END_DATE, CAR_VIN_COUNT, TOTAL_AMOUNT, RED_AMOUNT, BLUE_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT, DEDUCTION_REASON, CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_DATE, SETTLEMENT_DATE, CONFIRMOR, CONFIRM_DATE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{reconciliationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reconciliationStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reconciliationEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carVinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{redAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{blueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerFeedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settlementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update fs_customer_reconciliation RECONCILIATION_NUMBER = #{reconciliationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECONCILIATION_START_DATE = #{reconciliationStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECONCILIATION_END_DATE = #{reconciliationEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CAR_VIN_COUNT = #{carVinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RED_AMOUNT = #{redAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BLUE_AMOUNT = #{blueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{deductionTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_DATE = #{customerFeedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRMOR = #{confirmor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONFIRM_DATE = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update fs_customer_reconciliation set RECONCILIATION_NUMBER = #{reconciliationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RECONCILIATION_START_DATE = #{reconciliationStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECONCILIATION_END_DATE = #{reconciliationEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CAR_VIN_COUNT = #{carVinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RED_AMOUNT = #{redAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BLUE_AMOUNT = #{blueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT = #{deductionTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEDUCTION_REASON = #{deductionReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK_DATE = #{customerFeedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SETTLEMENT_DATE = #{settlementDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRMOR = #{confirmor,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CONFIRM_DATE = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation self left join sys_corp corpA on self.CUSTOMER_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_user userA on self.CONFIRMOR = userA.USER_ID left join bd_user userB on self.CREATOR = userB.USER_ID left join bd_user userC on self.CHECKER = userC.USER_ID order by self.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: update fs_customer_reconciliation self set self.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus}, self.CHECKER = #{checker}, self.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} where self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId}
update fs_customer_reconciliation self set self.DEL = 1 where self.RECONCILIATION_ID = #{reconciliationId}
mapper.select: select from fs_customer_reconciliation self left join sys_corp corpA on self.CUSTOMER_ID = corpA.CORP_ID left join sys_corp corpB on self.CORP_ID = corpB.CORP_ID left join bd_user userA on self.CONFIRMOR = userA.USER_ID left join bd_user userB on self.CREATOR = userB.USER_ID left join bd_user userC on self.CHECKER = userC.USER_ID where self.RECONCILIATION_NUMBER = #{reconciliationNumber}
